subject: Any article on the design of JUnit 4.1 ?
msgSnippet: Hi, JUnit 3.8.x has an excellent article describing its design: JUnit A Cook s Tour (http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/cookstour/cookstour.htm). As far as I
messageBody:
Hi,

JUnit 3.8.x has an excellent article describing its design: JUnit A
Cook's Tour
(http://junit.sourceforge.net/doc/cookstour/cookstour.htm). As far as
I know, version 4.1 has a significant change in the architecture of
the framework. Does anyone know if there are similar articles
somewhere describing this new version? It'd be especially helpful if
the descriptions are in terms of patterns with illustrative diagrams.

Thanks,
David.
